overview.title: Formula 1
overview.excerpt: Predict race outcomes and performance metrics of Formula 1 drivers using linear regression.

details.title: Formula 1
details.longDescription: This project uses Formula 1 race data to predict driver performance and race outcomes through linear regression techniques. Features include driver stats, team performance, track information, and historical results. Users can apply multiple regression models and evaluate using MSE, RMSE, and RÂ² metrics.
